Compare type.

Values

(0)

Variables
DEFAULT_COMPARE
const CompareType String::DEFAULT_COMPARE

Default comparison type.

EMPTY_STRING
const string String::EMPTY_STRING

Empty string. Useful when a reference to a string is needed.

INVALID_INDEX
const size_t String::INVALID_INDEX

Sentinel value used by string methods.

NO_MORE_TOKENS
const size_t String::NO_MORE_TOKENS

Sentinel value used by string tokenization when there are no tokens remaining.

WHITESPACE_CHARACTERS
const string String::WHITESPACE_CHARACTERS

A string that contains one instance of every whitespace character.
